name: Windy Harbors
description:
Windy Harbors Bring Them Home Introduction

This game was made for the trijam #189  with the theme push and pull

You play as a storm who has to PUSH the color coded ships into the right port

Instructions
  • Move with WASD!
  • Push the ships into the right ports by clicking on them!
  • Keep the ships from colliding!
  • If you let 5 ships collide you lose!

Thanks for Playing!

Here is the games Devlog: www.youtube.com/watch?v=V1hxCI-uXFw&t=4s
